text: Ngangom Dingko Singh (1 January 1979 â€“ 10 June 2021) was an Indian boxer. He won the gold medal at 1998 Asian Games in Bangkok. He was born in Manipur, India. He was awarded the Padma Shri in 2013. He also participated in the 2000 Summer Olympics. Singh died on 10 June 2021 from liver cancer in Manipur, aged 42. He had recovered from COVID-19 before his death. ==References== Category:1979 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from liver cancer Category:Olympians for India Category:Indian boxers
title: Dingko Singh
